About Me

Mechanical Engineering graduate with a Bachelor's degree(Yildiz Technical University 2012). I have a background in industrial laser machines and the construction business, where I developed precision engineering skills and gained experience in project management. In the past 2 years, I've immersed myself in the world of coding, specializing as a Full-Stack(MERN stack) Developer.
